user: I want to manage an existing booking
agent:
Welcome to HDFC Mutual Funds Advisor Scheduler. Please note this service is for informational purposes only and does not constitute investment advice.

I can certainly help you manage your existing booking. To proceed, could you please provide your **Booking Code** (e.g., NL-X99Z)? 

If you don't have your booking code, I can also look it up using the **name or alias** and the **time/date** you used for the appointment. Which would you prefer?
